definitions.definition: Easy, now especially in a disparaging sense; contemptibly easy.
Amiable, flexible, easy to get along with.
definitions.example: His facile disposition made him many friends.

definitions.definition: Lazy, simplistic (especially of explanations, discussions etc.).
Of a reaction or other process, taking place readily.
definitions.example: Decarboxylation of beta-keto acids is facile...
